blog.name: that-nerd-trying-all-the-arts
blog.title: It is going to be a hell of a ride!
blog.description: Hello Hello! This will be where I dump my art, writing, and stuff of that nature. I'm learning so be patient with me. I am in many fandoms so you can ask for writing and I can see what I can do! When I fall deep into fandoms I fall hard and rarely climb out. Star Wars and Critical Role hold most of the pieces of my soul, but feel free to strike up a conversation with me about anything really!

summary: Well, I did it. I have watched all the way up to episode 114 of campaign 1. I already know what happens cause you can’t get into...
body: Well, I did it. I have watched all the way up to episode 114 of campaign 1. I already know what happens cause you can’t get into this fandom without seeing spoilers but god am I nervous to sit down and see it all happen. Let’s just hit play and prepare to cry.

tags: also i didn't add Sam's ad spots on purpose bc i really don't like them
summary: My favourite Crit Role things; an incomplete list:
body:
My favourite Crit Role things; an incomplete list:

  • Every time they randomly start singing a song I inevitably don’t recognize
  • Every time one of them makes a quip that’s apparently a reference to something I’m way too young to understand and start laughing their asses off
  • Watching Travis not even try to hide the heart eyes when Laura has Jester do something cool
  • Every time Matt becomes the living embodiment of the >:3c face
  • Every time some Fucked Up Shit™ happens and both Liam and especially Taliesin look utterly delighted while the rest of the players look horrified
  • Every time Taliesin announces that he “has a Thing”
  • Related to that, every time in the first campaign Tal said he had An Idea™
  • Every time Beau gets the gay bc honestly mood
  • Literally every second Ashley is present
  • The way Travis and Ashley do battle cries when Yasha rages
  • “ragé”
  • When The Gang cause Matt to crack and he just starts laughing his ass off. It’s the cutest shit he’s so adorable
  • Matt’s impressions of other PCs and the players’ reactions to them (personal favourites include his Yasha (adorable) his Clay (really sweet) and his Shakäste (way cooler and sexier than he gave himself credit for))
  • How the boys are so unashamedly affectionate with each other. So many guys these days need to see that that kinda shit is okay.
  • Taliesin’s happy wiggles
  • Those moments when Matt is RPing a powerful woman and Marisha gives him That Look that’s quite clearly not 100% Beau
  • Liam trying to be Serious Shit and every single time Laura makes him crack up by being Laura
  • The fact the twins still have Twinnie Energy
  • The Lore Moments
  • Beau being very bad at both flirting and peopling in general
  • Jester’s pranks
  • Every time Nott has her moments and just gushes about someone she loves
  • Nugget
  • The fact that we finally have PCs with living parents
  • The fact that one of them is a PC with a good relationship with her mother in a genre where being a mother is the most dangerous thing to be
  • The fact that said mother is a sex worker who’s portrayed in a really positive light (which is to be expected since Matt is friends with Satine and probably others from that industry)
  • How genuinely The Gang stan each other
  • Foster
  • Like. I love him you guys he’s such a Good Guy
  • DANI MOTHERFUCKING CARR
  • Literally everything about Dani Carr
  • She’s a OG critter you guys
  • Who made it to their actual company
  • I’m so happy for her
  • And she’s so amazing I love her so much
  • Sam’s flask
  • Sam’s shirts
  • Matt noticing when Sam’s wearing one of his Matt Shirts and how much it derails everything
  • Cad’s pep talks
  • The way that Travis switched the accent of his narration when Fjord was alone and panicking about losing his powers to match how he was scared back into his real accent. It was a tiny touch but y'all I loved it
  • Henry
  • Watching Matt when Marisha As Beau is being a badass and trying to catch his poker face crack into heart eyes even tho it rarely ever happens
  • But when it does it’s like glimpsing a shooting star and everything is right with the world
  • Matt’s blatant, open, not even slightly hidden heart eyes at his wife at every other second they’re on screen together
  • Like couples episodes of Talks are my actual favourite bc how the palpable adoration in the room for every frame
  • All the times out of game (announcements and after the game and also on Talks) when they slip into random accents and voices
  • Did I mention Henry?
  • Also how much they celebrate when Ashley returns from the war Blindspot
  • The celebrations when Matt brings out a guest, especially when it’s situations like Chris where they aren’t expecting it
  • The euphoria when they get that crucial Nat20
  • In expansion, True Love’s Crit
  • Just
  • True Love’s Crit
  • When they catch Matt’s plan so perfectly that he can’t even try to keep a poker face and he’s just so proud of them
  • When they solve a tricky puzzle or describe a really badass hdywdt for something they’ve been stuck on for ages and he looks at them almost like what I imagine a proud father would look like
  • Just those moments he’s proud of his friends for figuring it out I live for those moments and that specific smile
  • Oh yea! Those moments where one of them describes a particularly brutal and grusome hdywdt and Matt gives that look of horror that devolves into delirious laughter
  • The times Tal perfectly calls a roll (usually a Nat20) and everyone celebrates while Matt looks legitimately scared

I think that’s everything for now? I’m definitely forgetting things bc it’s late and my brain is awful but yea.

summary: Caleb does see Nott as his little sister and best friend/life partner he said once, so that's nice. I honestly prefer...
question: Caleb does see Nott as his little sister and best friend/life partner he said once, so that's nice. I honestly prefer friendships to relationships related to dating. It's much nicer and more pleasant to me.
answer: That’s pretty true actually, I guess I was thinking in regards to how NOTT sees Caleb as her boy when she lost her’s for a while, you know?

summary: Hey I've been seeing a lot of your Fjordjester thoughts lately and just wanna say thanks for talking about it all respectfully!...
question: Hey I've been seeing a lot of your Fjordjester thoughts lately and just wanna say thanks for talking about it all respectfully! It's refreshing to see character and shipping discussion that isn't just people screaming at each other about OTPs and bad writing  Which ships are your favorite and why? If you don't mind me asking!
answer:
If we’re talking about Critical Role ships, the only one I have strong feelings for is Widofjord! Ever since their first interactions I found it a potentially adorable ship (I’m actually pretty sure I was one of the key people who made sure the ship name was Widofjord and not Fjordgast?) Obviously with the campaign developing things have changed for both of them now that we know the full extent of their damage and backstories, and I don’t know if EITHER can be in a healthy relationship, especially Caleb. However, literally every time they interact in one on one dialogue, they have this intense energy of understanding and connection, and when it’s just small interactions it always kinda feels like cute flirts or just adorable moments whether it was shippy or not. I really love their comradery and their similarities, and the day that Fjord finally finds the words to explain who he was, and Caleb finds the courage to explain who HE was to each other, I cannot wait to see that unfold (especially the angst, Fjord will NOT take Caleb killing his parents well)

So like, let’s throw shipping aside for a second, I feel like these 2 characters bounce off of each other and compliment each other to create intense and meaningful RP, and since they are probably never gonna be canon, even seeing them become the closest of friends, best friends even, would be amazing and I think would really help them heal mentally and emotionally.

Yeah so that’s my say on shipping. Also BeauJester is really cute I like that as well but I don’t feel so strongly about it that I’d be sad if it didn’t happen.

tags: the real answer may be widofjorester after all
summary: I completely understand where you’re coming from with Fjord and Jester (I personally like it because I love seeing Laura flirt...
question: I completely understand where you’re coming from with Fjord and Jester (I personally like it because I love seeing Laura flirt with her husband at the table). Forces outside the game effect how you feel about the ship. This is why Caleb and Jester will never be romantic to me.
answer: Exactly! Caleb and Jester are easier for me to imagine because Laura and Liam roleplayed siblings, they aren’t actual siblings, then again I DO sometimes get that big brother little sister vibe from them (Caleb is kinda like everyone’s Big Brother except for Nott and Caddy) so it makes that ship kinda not click with me either but I still see more coherency in it then with Fjorester.

reblog.comment: Exactly!
